ygData.subject: Re: Standing Down
ygData.msgSnippet: Destructor nodded. Thats fine as long as you  have a good reason. He knew Megatron had to be stopped. So when do we attack? My four horsmen are ready.

 Destructor nodded. "Thats fine as long as you  have a good reason." He knew 
Megatron had to be stopped. "So when do we attack? My four horsmen are 
ready." Peastelence, War,famine and Death rose from behind him. There eyes 
burning red.
